name: Steve Smith
comment: The new Sony WH-1000XM4 wireless headphones are a clear improvement over Sony’s already excellent line of Bluetooth headphones. They are very comfortable and provide superb listening experience in noisy places like home, office. Their unmatched quality is evident in every feature.

name: Ross Taylor
comment: The Sony WH-1000XM4’s (XM4’s from now on) are a pair of much awaited and longed for headphones and I am here to report that Sony has impressed me yet again. Let’s start with inside the box where we have a hard carrying case, the headphones, a usb type C cable, a 3.5mm cable along with the usual paperwork.

name: Ben Stokes
comment: These are definitely the best wireless headphones I have ever owned. The headphones are very comfortable, well balanced. It may seem weird, but sometimes I forget that I am wearing them. They are adjustable and the ear cups are soft and don't press on my ears. I have worn them until the power drains with no issues.

name: David Warner
comment: A lot of you probably by now have heard the top-rated Sony WH-1000MX3 by now. And you’re obviously curious about what the differences are between the WH-1000MX3 against the newly launched WH-1000MX4. Well to cut a long story short, the changes are more subtle and not a radical improvement.

name: Joe Root
comment: The Sony WH-1000XM4 are somewhat large, but the ear-cups are well padded and are very comfortable to wear for hours on end. The headband portion also has plenty of padding so that the headphones rest comfortably on the top of your head. This is highly recomended for anyon e who loves music.

name: Shane Watson
comment: Best for TV viewing and Sony dual Bluetooth function helps you hear the cell ring. If you take the headphone off it pauses the movie.The noise cancelling is not as good as Bose but a slight increase of volume compensates. Battery life is phenomenal, yes 3-4 movies easy before charge necessary.
